column4: Is there a log of mounted and unmounted devices that survives reboots/shutdowns (something like logging it the HDD)?
Is there a log of mounted and unmounted devices that survives reboots/shutdowns (something like logging it the HDD)?
why is this the only channel where I *never ever* get an answer to my questions, no matter whether they are trivial or not?
Cause as soon as you say anything everyone yells at you for being off topic?
